resources.string: Please type in your name to save your score!
Wackelpudding is a game where you need to reach the exit
. \n Movement though is only possible through indirect means by interacting with blocks

Hi, my name is Nick! 
I got sucked into my notebook because of my, let’s call it unusual eating habit regarding Jell-O (no, I’m not addicted! - okay, maybe a little bit) and now I’m stuck. Please help me? 
 
 
There are three maneuvers you can use to help me escape: 
 
1. Getting thrown back by a block:

By pressing this button I will be thrown back from the next block (which will also rotate it clockwise) and then again be thrown back from the last one. I know, I’ll land on the exact same spot I was before but hey, I managed to rotate the next block! \n \n2. Following a block’s direction:

You first have to make sure that the diagonal side of the next block faces me (or I’m screwed) because I will simply bounce off at a 90 degree angle. This way I’m able to reach the levels above or below me. \n \n3. Sliding through a block:

Well, I can slide through Jell-O-blocks, which would be kinda fun if I wasn’t STUCK HERE! 
 
 
Pause Menu
By pressing the last little button you can open the pause menu. But I’m sure you wouldn’t leave me here, would you? \n \nTraps? Traps!

Oh, those things? ****! Just pay attention, so I don’t get caught in one of them (there are even traps surrounding the level), I really don’t want to lose a life. Btw, I have 3 lifes but don’t even think about it! \n \nThe Entrance
Just the beginning of a (hopefully not so) long journey. \n \nThe Exit
